bibl.title: Report on the Excavations at Abu Mina in Spring 2001.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.note: 1. Building remains. - 2. A circular structure, the so-called watering place. - 3. Architectural elements. - Pp. 25-31. Appendix on the wine-presses in ‘Izbat Mohamed Farid (5th-6th cent. A.D.), about one km to the north of Abu Mina, by Abdal-Aziz SHINAWY and P.Gr.
GROSSMANN Peter, Report on the Excavations at Abu Mina in Spring 2001.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 41 (2002) pp. 15-31, figg., plans et pll. VI-X.
